channel.title: Demons & Kingdoms of Doom BETA .BAT Game
channel.description: :P I'm making a .bat game and it is still beta I need some ideas for it... and comments Here is what I have done so far. Its not hard at all I just don't got a good imagination (Idk how to spell) [code]@echo off cls :menu title Moparsc4p3's Game Beta echo Welcome To Moparsc4p3's Game BETA echo Pick a choice to choose your destiny. echo You lost all hope, everyone was terrified of you, but this quest can help you. echo Great power is at your fingertips if you can reach it. echo. echo Choose one to move on. echo. echo c - To Hunt for the great red demon echo r - To run an important package to the kingdom of doom. echo e - To exit out of my game echo. echo. set /p moveOn=Option: if %moveOn%==c goto moveOn if %moveOn%==C goto moveOn if %moveOn%==r goto run if %moveOn%==R goto run if %moveOn%==e goto end if %moveOn%==E goto end :moveOn title The Great Red Demon Hunt cls echo The king of the elves speaks of great danger. echo He forewarns that it will be a very hard task. echo You have three paths from here. echo You either have to abandon all hope, echo Head towards the black path, echo or wander off into the void. echo. echo Your life depends on it. echo. echo A - to Abandon all hope echo B - to Go to the black path echo V - Go to the void echo. set /p moveOn2=Option: if %moveOn2%==a goto abandon if %moveOn2%==A goto abandon if %moveOn2%==b goto black2 if %moveOn2%==B goto black2 if %moveOn2%==v goto doom if %moveOn2%==V goto doom :run title Package delivery cls echo The elven king has asked for you to take echo a very important package to the kingdom of doom. echo You accept graciously and are on your way there. echo Before you reach the end you come across a stranger. echo She asks you for the package you are carrying. echo. echo Will you give it to her? echo. echo G - To give it to her echo S - To slap her and run. echo. set /p 2moveOn2=Option: if %2moveOn2%==g goto give if %2moveOn2%==g goto give if %2moveOn2%==b goto slap if %2moveOn2%==B goto slap :slap cls echo Making more soon... :slap cls echo Making more soon... :abandon cls echo Making more soon... :black2 cls echo Making more soon... :doom cls echo Making more soon... :give cls echo Making more soon... pause[/code]

item.title: Demons & Kingdoms of Doom BETA .BAT Game
item.dc:creator: @moparsc4p3 moparsc4p3
item.description:
@moparsc4p3 wrote:

I’m making a .bat game and it is still beta I need some ideas for it… and comments
Here is what I have done so far. Its not hard at all I just don’t got a good imagination (Idk how to spell)

@echo off cls :menu title Moparsc4p3's Game Beta echo Welcome To Moparsc4p3's Game BETA echo Pick a choice to choose your destiny. echo You lost all hope, everyone was terrified of you, but this quest can help you. echo Great power is at your fingertips if you can reach it. echo. echo Choose one to move on. echo. echo c - To Hunt for the great red demon echo r - To run an important package to the kingdom of doom. echo e - To exit out of my game echo. echo. set /p moveOn=Option: if %moveOn%==c goto moveOn if %moveOn%==C goto moveOn if %moveOn%==r goto run if %moveOn%==R goto run if %moveOn%==e goto end if %moveOn%==E goto end :moveOn title The Great Red Demon Hunt cls echo The king of the elves speaks of great danger. echo He forewarns that it will be a very hard task. echo You have three paths from here. echo You either have to abandon all hope, echo Head towards the black path, echo or wander off into the void. echo. echo Your life depends on it. echo. echo A - to Abandon all hope echo B - to Go to the black path echo V - Go to the void echo. set /p moveOn2=Option: if %moveOn2%==a goto abandon if %moveOn2%==A goto abandon if %moveOn2%==b goto black2 if %moveOn2%==B goto black2 if %moveOn2%==v goto doom if %moveOn2%==V goto doom :run title Package delivery cls echo The elven king has asked for you to take echo a very important package to the kingdom of doom. echo You accept graciously and are on your way there. echo Before you reach the end you come across a stranger. echo She asks you for the package you are carrying. echo. echo Will you give it to her? echo. echo G - To give it to her echo S - To slap her and run. echo. set /p 2moveOn2=Option: if %2moveOn2%==g goto give if %2moveOn2%==g goto give if %2moveOn2%==b goto slap if %2moveOn2%==B goto slap :slap cls echo Making more soon... :slap cls echo Making more soon... :abandon cls echo Making more soon... :black2 cls echo Making more soon... :doom cls echo Making more soon... :give cls echo Making more soon... pause

Read full topic
